SELECT
eate.sourceEntityCode as entityCode, eate.sourceEntityCodeNamespace as entityCodeNamespace
eate.targetEntityCode as entityCode, eate.targetEntityCodeNamespace as entityCodeNamespace
FROM $prefix$entityAssnsToEntity eate
WHERE eate.entityAssnsGuid IN ( #param2[]# )

SELECT eate.entityAssnsGuid, entity.description, codingScheme.codingSchemeURI, codingScheme.representsVersion, codingScheme.codingSchemeName,
eate.sourceEntityCode as entityCode, eate.sourceEntityCodeNamespace as entityCodeNamespace,
eate.targetEntityCode as entityCode, eate.targetEntityCodeNamespace as entityCodeNamespace,
quals.qualifierName, quals.qualifierValue FROM $prefix$entityAssnsToEntity eate LEFT JOIN $prefix$entity entity ON (
eate.sourceEntityCode = entity.entityCode AND eate.sourceEntityCodeNamespace = entity.entityCodeNamespace
eate.targetEntityCode = entity.entityCode AND eate.targetEntityCodeNamespace = entity.entityCodeNamespace
) LEFT JOIN $prefix$codingScheme codingScheme ON (entity.codingSchemeGuid = codingScheme.codingSchemeGuid)
LEFT JOIN $prefix$entityAssnQuals quals ON (eate.entityAssnsGuid = quals.referenceGuid)
WHERE eate.entityAssnsGuid IN ( #param2[]# )
